name: Devansh Mahant

Implemented 10 new features that enhanced user experience and system efficiency, leading to a 15% increase in user satisfaction
Resolved 50+ bugs and performed code refactoring, resulting in a 20% boost in performance and maintainability

projects.name: MIS MESSAGES - ANONYMOUS MESSAGING
projects.description: Developed an anonymous messaging website enabling users to gather feedback via forms without revealing respondents' identities. Integrated NextAuth for secure authentication, implementing email OTP verification for enhanced user security. Utilized MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval, ensuring seamless user experience and data management.

projects.name: SPOTIFY AI RECOMMENDER
projects.description: Implemented an AI-based music search platform where users can chat their feelings or preferences to get personalized song recommendations. Integrated Spotify API and OAuth for secure authentication and access to user data and song previews. Utilized Google Gemini for natural language processing to interpret user input and generate tailored music suggestions. Developed the entire project within a 24-hour timeframe, showcasing rapid prototyping skills.
